attributes.action: The government should introduce the amnesty scheme to help the immigrants
attributes.additional_details: The government should introduce a amnesty scheme like legacy and regulise all overstayers for The people that are living in the UK who have no immigration status from 2010-2020.
attributes.background: The government should introduce a amnesty scheme like legacy and regulise all overstayers for The people that are living in the UK who have no immigration status from 2010-2020

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
